Start-Title:
SwissGuesser: photo collection from
World War I
Start-Text: Welcome to SwissGuesser, the game that takes you on a historical trip through the country. First we will show you a photograph from the Swiss Federal Archives. The images are from footage of the Second World War, taken somewhere in Switzerland. Can you guess where?
